spec_data.Name: perl-Perl6-Slurp
spec_data.Description:
slurp takes:

a filename,
a filehandle,
a typeglob reference,
an IO::File object, or
a scalar reference,

converts it to an input stream (using open() if necessary),
and reads in the entire stream. If slurp fails to set up or
read the stream, it throws an exception.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:07:22 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
